turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Cosmos sherffii.
turn.1: What is known about Cosmos sherffii?
turn.2: Cosmos sherffii Cosmos sherffii is a Mexican species of plants in the sunflower family.
turn.4: It has been found only in the state of Oaxaca in southern Mexico.
turn.6: "Cosmos sherffii" is a branching perennial up to 80 cm (32 inches) tall, producing thick, tuberous roots underground.

turn.8: Leaves are highly divided into many small lobes and leaflets.
turn.9: What are the different colors of the flowers?
